bdi4jade.belief

Class TransientBelief<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl
      • bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBelief<T>
        • bdi4jade.belief.TransientBelief<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the belief value.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Belief<T>, MetadataElement, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SoftgoalPreferences

    public class TransientBelief<T>
extends AbstractBelief<T>
    This class extends the AbstractBelief class and represents a transient belief, which is not persisted in a permanent memory.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
